decision_conditions: The submitted information regarding Conditions 3 (Cycle Parking) is unacceptable as it shows reduction in cycle parking spaces and other, unauthorised variations to the approved plans of the original planning permission ref no  20/01711/PAR2R.Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 4 (Waste and Recycling) as it does not demonstrate that the proposed waste and recycling facilities would be in the interests of the character and appearance of the area and the living conditions of neighbouring occupiers.Insufficient information has been provided with regards to Condition 6 (Car Parking Management Plan). The applicant is advised to submit a completed unilateral undertaking under Section 16 of the Greater London Council (General Powers) Act 1974.The applicant is advised to resubmit with further evidence.
